official_title: To designate the visitors center at Warm Springs Dam, California, as the "Milt Brandt Visitors Center".

summary.text: Designates the visitors center at the Warms Springs Dam component of the project for flood control, Russian River, Dry Creek, California, as the Milt Brandt Visitors Center.
